text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer! Look at this, it's a 
new carbonated juice drink!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I really wanted to try it so I went full
turbo while coming back! I'm so thirsty!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
…… Huh, did this bottle always bulge
out like this? Ah, whatever, time for
my juice!
